name: Trends in chemical pollution
description: Trends in modeled chemical pollution from commercial shipping traffic, ports and harbors, and land-based organic and inorganic inputs (Halpern et al., 2015, Spatial and temporal changes in cumulative human impacts on the world's ocean, http://www.nature.com/ncomms/2015/150714/ncomms8615/full/ncomms8615.html)

name: Trends in global population
description: Trends in global population is used as a proxy for trends in marine plastics trash pollution (UN, 2015, http://esa.un.org/unpd/wpp/Download/Standard/Population/)

name: Trends in global CCAMLR populations
description: Trends in CCAMLR population is used as a proxy for trends in pathogens

name: Catch data
description: CCAMLR catch data for each species/year/region (CCAMLR Statistical Bulletin Vol. 27, 2015, https://www.ccamlr.org/en/document/data/ccamlr-statistical-bulletin-vol-27)

name: CCAMLR catch limits
description: CCAMLR catch limits (CCAMLR Fishery Reports, 2014, https://www.ccamlr.org/en/publications/fishery-reports-2014)

name: Sea ice season days
description: Length of sea ice season (days)

name: Iconic species status
description: Iconic species of Antarctica and IUCN threat status.  List of Iconic species is from OHI global assessment (Halpern et al. 2015); status is from IUCN (IUCN, 2015, http://www.iucnredlist.org); and spatial information is from IUCN and Aquamaps range maps (IUCN, 2015, http://www.iucnredlist.org; Kaschner et al., 2015, www.aquamaps.org)

name: Iconic species trend
description: Iconic species of Antarctica and IUCN trend status.  List of Iconic species is from OHI global assessment (Halpern et al. 2015); status is from IUCN (IUCN, 2015, http://www.iucnredlist.org); and spatial information is from IUCN and Aquamaps range maps (IUCN, 2015, http://www.iucnredlist.org; Kaschner et al., 2015, www.aquamaps.org)

name: Crew data
description: Crew data for tourist (see tourism and recreation goal) and fishing vessels (CCAMLR, 2015, compliance: vessel licensing, https://www.ccamlr.org/en/compliance/licensed-vessels)

name: Protected marine areas
description: Protected marine areas of CCAMLR regions (CCAMLR, 2014, Status of Antarctic specially protected area and Antarctic specially managed area management plans, http://www.ats.aq/documents/ATCM37/WW/atcm37_ww002_e.pdf)

name: Ocean acidification
description: Change in current year's modeled aragonite saturation state relative to historical mean (1880-1889) (Feely et al, 2009, doi:10.5670/oceanog.2009.95; J. Afflerbach et al., 2015, https://github.com/OHI-Science/ohiprep/tree/master/globalprep/Pressures_OceanAcidification/v2015)

name: Sea surface temperature (SST) anomalies
description: Change in sea surface temperature anomolies compared to reference period (1985-1989) (NOAA, 2015; and methods: Selig et al., 2010 and Afflerbach, 2015, https://github.com/OHI-Science/ohiprep/tree/master/globalprep/Pressures_SST)

name: High commercial fishing bycatch
description: Modeled destructive commercial fishing practices by 5 different gear types (Halpern et al. 2008, doi:10.1126/science.1149345; Behrenfeld and Falkowksi, 1997)

name: Low commercial fishing bycatch
description: Modeled least destructive commercial fishing practices by 2 different gear types (Halpern et al. 2008, doi:10.1126/science.1149345; Behrenfeld and Falkowksi, 1997)

name: Alien species
description: The number and type of invasive and harmful invasive species in each marine ecoregion (Molnar et al. 2008, https://doi.org/10.1890/070064)

name: Chemical pollution
description: Modeled chemical pollution from commercial shipping traffic, ports and harbors, and land-based organic and inorganic inputs (data: Halpern et al. 2008, 2015).

name: Trash pollution
description: Global marine plastics (data: Eriksen et al., 2014, doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0111913; methods: Afflerbach, 2015, https://github.com/OHI-Science/ohiprep/tree/master/globalprep/CW_pressure_trash)

name: Potential pathogen pollution
description: Effectiveness of waste water treatment at field stations scaled by population size

name: CCAMLR regions to OHI id
description: Translate between different label types

name: CCAMLR regions
description: CCAMLR marine regions (CCAMLR Convention Area, 2015, https://www.ccamlr.org/en/organisation/convention-area)

name: CCAMLR marine area, km2
description: CCAMLR marine area (CCAMLR Convention Area, 2015, https://www.ccamlr.org/en/organisation/convention-area)

name: CCAMLR inland 1 km, km2
description: CCAMLR marine area (CCAMLR Convention Area, 2015, https://www.ccamlr.org/en/organisation/convention-area)

name: RFMO governance effectiveness
description: Governance effectiveness of CCAMLR Regional Fisheries Management Organization.

name: Kyoto signatories
description: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change, Kyoto Protocol (UN FCCC, 2015, http://unfccc.int/kyoto_protocol/status_of_ratification/items/2613.php).  Global score based on proportion of global signatories.

name: emissions progress
description: Effectiveness of global emissions cutting progress based on United Nations Environment Programme GAP Report (Ullstein, 2013)

name: Effectiveness of Marpol regulations
description: IMO's International Convention for the Control and Management of Ships' Ballast Water and Sediments (BMW, 2015, http://www.imo.org/en/About/Conventions/ListOfConventions/Pages/International-Convention-for-the-Control-and-Management-of-Ships'-Ballast-Water-and-Sediments-(BWM).aspx).  Score based on 'expert judgement' based on (1) having the regulatory framework in place, and (2) enforcement and effectivenss.

name: Effectiveness of Marpol regulations
description: IMO's International Convention for the Prevention of Pollution from Ships (MARPOL, 2015, http://www.imo.org/en/About/Conventions/ListOfConventions/Pages/International-Convention-for-the-Prevention-of-Pollution-from-Ships-(MARPOL).aspx). Score based on 'expert judgement' based on (1) having the regulatory framework in place, and (2) enforcement and effectivenss.

name: LSP status
description: See Lasting Special Places description.  Calculated in Lasting Special Places function of the toolbox (saved in temp folder).

name: Species status
description: Regional average of species IUCN threat status, using methods described in Halpern et al. 2015; status is from IUCN (IUCN, 2015, http://www.iucnredlist.org); and spatial information is from IUCN and Aquamaps range maps (IUCN, 2015, http://www.iucnredlist.org; Kaschner et al., 2015, www.aquamaps.org)

name: Species trend
description: Regional average of species IUCN trend, using methods described in Halpern et al. 2015; status is from IUCN (IUCN, 2015, http://www.iucnredlist.org); and spatial information is from IUCN and Aquamaps range maps (IUCN, 2015, http://www.iucnredlist.org; Kaschner et al., 2015, www.aquamaps.org)

name: Tourist days
description: Number of tourist days (IAATO, 2015, http://iaato.org/tourism-statistics)

name: Jobs weighting
description: Jobs weighting by sector (defaulting to 1)

name: Habitat presence
description: Modeled combined habitat presence

name: Sea ice loss of season pressure
description: Inverse of sea ice habitat status scaled so a 50% reduction in season length corresponds to a pressure of 1.  This dataset is generated in the HAB function of the toolbox.
